elements.text:
Your friend convinces you to go on a walk through a local park. You have heard that there are poisonous snakes in that park.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: It'll be nice to walk in the park.
I'm really not looking forward to going into the park that might have snakes, but I know that I can tolerate my feelings of anxiety.
I'm going to get bitten by a snake!
I'm looking forward to talking to my friend.
Even though I've heard there might be snakes in the park, I think it's unlikely that I will see one.
